mapper.select: SELECT di.SourceId, di.UniqueCode, di.CompanyId, di.SourceName, di.RValue, di.RecordNo, di.Validity, di.Status, di.Longt, di.Lat, di.OutPersonCount, di.DeathToll, di.RecordDate, sd.DictName AS Rank FROM TB_BASE_DANGERSOURCE_INFO di JOIN TB_SYS_DATADICT sd ON di.Rank = sd.DictId WHERE di.CompanyId =#{companyId}

SELECT cr.RelationId, cr.MonitorUnit, cr.TechnologyId, sd.DictName AS TechnologyName FROM TB_REL_COMPANY_ART cr JOIN TB_SYS_DATADICT sd ON cr.TechnologyId = sd.DictId WHERE cr.CompanyId = #{companyId}
